## Introducction

This package provides R users with a new way to access Peru's official cartographic data on various topics that are managed by the Spatial Data Infrastructure of Peru.

<img src='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ambarja/geoidep/main/man/figures/idesep.png' width='100%'/>


## Working with R

```{r setup}
library(ggplot2)
library(geoidep)
```

## Official Administrative Boundaries by INEI

```{r}
departaments <- get_departaments(show_progress = FALSE)
```

```{r}
names(departaments)
```


```{r}
# Display the first 10 rows of the data frame `departaments`
head(departaments)
```

## Simple Visualization

```{r}
ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(data = departaments) +
  theme_minimal()
```
